meanings.definition: A detailed plan or guide for achieving a goal or objective.
meanings.sent1: The team used roadmaps to outline their project steps.
meanings.sent2: I always rely on roadmaps when organizing my tasks.
meanings.sent3: The roadmaps for the treasure hunt led us to the wrong place!
meanings.sent4: Her roadmap for success included hard work and dedication.
meanings.sent5: Following the roadmap carefully, he reached his destination without any confusion.

meanings.definition: A visual representation of a route or path for travel.
meanings.sent1: The old map was a detailed roadmap of the city streets.
meanings.sent2: She studied the roadmap before starting her road trip.
meanings.sent3: The roadmap on the GPS showed a shortcut through the forest.
meanings.sent4: His eyes followed the roadmap as he navigated through the maze.
meanings.sent5: The roadmap displayed all the landmarks along the journey clearly.
